General.Name: Connection Technology Systems
General.Description: Connection Technology Systems Inc. fiber optic access solution. It offers fiber switch products, including access switches and CPE switches; fiber gateway products, such as residential gateways and VoIP residential gateways; and fiber media converter products comprising standalone, compact, and home size media converters. The company also provides lite industrial products, such as PoE and Ethernet switches, and PoE and industrial converters; PoE extender; and accessories, including small form-factor plug-ins, lightning protectors, external battery products, industrial power supply products, and fiber cable trays. It serves in Taiwan, Sweden, Germany, Austria, Japan, and the United States. Connection Technology Systems Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 79, Xintai 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
